data.comment: The big names in today's match at Serra Dourada have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Douglas Baggio of Goias gets in a strike, but is off target.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
In the minute 6, In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Goal! Wellington Paulista gives Fortaleza a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 8, Osvaldo with an assist there.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Goias.
Throw-in for Goias close to the penalty box.
In the minute 11, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a throw-in for Goias, close to Fortaleza's area.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
In the minute 14, Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Goias.
In the minute 16, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Goias.
Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Goias throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Goias.
In the minute 19, Juan Quintero (Fortaleza) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Fortaleza needs to be cautious. Goias have an attacking throw-in.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Fortaleza in Goiania.
In the minute 25, Rafael Vaz for Goias gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
Throw-in for Goias in the half of Fortaleza.
In the minute 26, Fortaleza's Osvaldo breaks free at Serra Dourada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Goias.
Luiz Gustavo (Goias) has received a yellow card from Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
In the minute 30, Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 31, Goias have a dangerous throw-in.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
In the minute 32, Can Goias capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fortaleza's half?
Fortaleza surge into the attack at Serra Dourada but Davidâ€™s header is off-target.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
In the minute 34, In Goiania, Osvaldo of Fortaleza is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Fortaleza.
In the minute 35, Free kick Goias.
Goias are pushing forward but Victor Andrade's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
In the minute 37, Goias to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
Goias's Sandro has run offside.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a throw-in for Fortaleza, close to Goias's area.
In the minute 40, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
Throw-in for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Goias's half.
In the minute 42, Fortaleza's David misses with an attempt on goal.
Goias have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Goias.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Free kick for Goias in the half of Fortaleza.
Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Serra Dourada.
At Serra Dourada, Rafael Vaz has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 46, Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Fortaleza make their first substitution with Paulao replacing Juan Quintero.
In the minute 46, Zeca is replacing Juan Pintado for Goias at Serra Dourada.
The away team replace David with Yuri Cesar.
Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Fortaleza at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 48, Goias to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in their own half.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Goias's half.
In the minute 49, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Goias a goal kick.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Zeca (Goias) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 51, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Goias have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Goias are coming forward and Daniel Bessa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Fortaleza at Serra Dourada.
Throw-in Goias.
Free kick Fortaleza.
In the minute 53, Goias's Sandro has been booked in Goiania.
Fortaleza are pushing forward but Yuri Cesar's finish is wide of the goal.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Goias a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Fortaleza have a dangerous throw-in.
Fortaleza's Wellington Paulista gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Goias needs to be cautious. Fortaleza have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 58, Zeca of Goias is pulled up for offside.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goias will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Fortaleza.
In the minute 60, Fortaleza take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Bruno Melo.
Great play from Yuri Cesar to set up the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
In Goiania Fortaleza attack through Osvaldo. The finish is off target, however.
Goias have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, The home team have replaced Victor Andrade with Ratinho. This is the second substitution made today by Ney Franco.
In the minute 62, Breno is replacing Sandro for the home team.
Breno of Goias gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
In the minute 66, Fortaleza's Yuri Cesar is whistled for offside at Serra Dourada.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards the away team a throw-in.
Mike is on a sub for Daniel Villalva for Goias.
In the minute 69, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Fortaleza extend their lead to 0-3 through Yuri Cesar.
That's a fine assist from Tinga.
In the minute 70, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade waits before resuming play because Yuri Cesar for Fortaleza is still down.
Yuri Cesar is back on the pitch.
Daniel Bessa for Goias gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 72, Goal kick for Fortaleza at Serra Dourada.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jefferson is on a sub for Heron for Goias.
In the minute 73, The away team replace Felipe with Ronald.
Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
Free kick for Goias in the half of Fortaleza.
In the minute 77, In Goiania Goias attack through Ratinho. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
Fortaleza make their fourth substitution with Gabriel Dias replacing Romarinho.
In the minute 79, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Goias.
Bruno Melo (Fortaleza) has received a first yellow card.
Rogerio Ceni is making the team's fifth substitution at Serra Dourada with Franco Rodrigo Fragapane replacing Osvaldo.
In the minute 80, Goal! Jefferson pulls one back for Goias to make it 1-3.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Free kick Goias.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Fortaleza at Serra Dourada.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 89, Goias have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Goias.
Throw-in for Goias in the half of Fortaleza.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Goias close to the penalty box.
Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Goias.
Free kick Goias.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Goiania. The final score is 1-3.
